docs.text: Jiemin Fang (方傑民) ¶ Email : Google Scholar | GitHub | Twitter | DBLP I am a senior researcher at Huawei, working closely with Prof. Qi Tian , Dr. Lingxi Xie and Dr. Xiaopeng Zhang . I received my PhD degree from the School of Electronic Information and Communications (EIC) at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST) in 2023, supervised by Prof. Wenyu Liu and Prof. Xinggang Wang . I obtained the B.E. degree from EIC , HUST in 2018. My current research mainly focuses on topics of 3D computer vision, especially neural rendering. My research interests also include neural architecture design/search and AutoML. If you are interested in intern/full-time positions at Huawei or any other collaboration with me, welcome to contact me via email. News ¶ Oct. 2023 - Fast High Dynamic Range Radiance Fields for Dynamic Scenes is accepted to 3DV 2024! Sep. 2023 - SA3D: Segment Anything in 3D with NeRFs is accepted to NeurIPS 2023! Mar. 2023 - ResizeMix is accepted by Computational Visual Media. Nov. 2022 - I lead the team to win the Gold Award in The 8 th China International College Students’ “Internet+” Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition (ranking the 1 st in the group of the industrial proposition track). Aug. 2022 - TiNeuVox is conditionally accepted to ACM SIGGRAPH Asia 2022. Jul. 2022 - I am honored to be awarded the HUST Academic Star (华中科技大学“学术新星”) ! Apr. 2022 - Our EfficientPose is chosen for the CVMJ 2021 best paper award. Mar. 2022 - Two papers are accepted by CVPR 2022. Jan. 2022 - BINGO is accepted by ICLR 2022. Jul. 2021 - One paper is accepted by ICCV 2021. Dec. 2020 - " FNA++: Fast Network Adaptation via Parameter Remapping and Architecture Search " is published in IEEE TPAMI. Nov. 2020 - I have released a PyTorch toolkit dali-pytorch for accelerating ImageNet training with NVIDIA DALI. It improves the training speed dramatically with maintaining high performance. Publications ¶ * denotes equal contribution. Journal Papers ¶ FNA++: Fast Network Adaptation via Parameter Remapping and Architecture Search Jiemin Fang *, Yuzhu Sun*, Qian Zhang, Kangjian Peng, Yuan Li, Wenyu Liu, Xinggang Wang IEEE Academic Services ¶ Journal Reviewers ¶ IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (IEEE TPAMI) International Journal of Computer Vision (IJCV) IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics (IEEE TVCG) IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems (IEEE TNNLS) IEEE Transactions on Multimedia (IEEE TMM) IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology (IEEE TCSVT) Neural Networks (NN) Science China Information Sciences (SCIS) Image and Vision Computing Machine Vision and Applications Journal of Big Data Conference Reviewers ¶ ACM SIGGRAPH Asia 2023 IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2023, 2022, 2021 IEEE/CVF International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) 2023, 2021 Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) 2023, 2022, 2021 International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR) 2024, 2023, 2022 International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML) 2023, 2022, 2021 European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV) 2022 AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI) 2024, 2023, 2021 Competition Experience ¶ I led the team to win the Gold Award in The 8 th China International College Students’ “Internet+” Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition (第八届中国国际“互联网+”大学生创新创业大赛) (ranking the 1 st in the group of the industrial proposition track) in 2022. I ever participated in RoboMaster Robotics Competition. I worked on embedded development and achieved the national second prize in 2017. Then in 2018, I led the team to win the national second prize. Awards ¶ HUST Academic Star (华中科技大学“学术新星”), 2022 National Scholarship for PhD Student, 2021 National Scholarship for Master Student, 2020 National Scholarship for Undergraduate Student, 2017
